homepage.hero_title: Dudu-Black Autos: Luxury Chauffeur Service in Nigeria
homepage.hero_subtitle: Experience unparalleled elegance and comfort for your special occasions across Nigeria.

contact_page.title: Contact Dudu-Black Autos
contact_page.subtitle: Get in touch for bookings or inquiries about our luxury chauffeur services in Nigeria.

service_page.rolls_royce_ghost_desc: The Ghost combines contemporary luxury with dynamic performance. Perfect for making an entrance.
service_page.vehicle_details_desc: Experience the pinnacle of automotive luxury with our Rolls Royce Ghost.

location_focus.desc_prefix: We proudly offer our luxury chauffeur services in
location_focus.desc_suffix: Our team ensures seamless travel throughout the area.

testimonials.placeholder1: Dudu-Black Autos provided an exceptional Rolls Royce for our wedding. The chauffeur was professional, the car was stunning, and everything ran perfectly smoothly. Truly unforgettable!
testimonials.placeholder2: For important business meetings, Dudu-Black is my go-to. Their punctuality and the sheer quality of their vehicles always impress my clients. Top-tier service.

faq.q1: What is included in the service?
faq.a1: Our service includes a professional chauffeur, the Rolls Royce Ghost, complimentary refreshments, and standard decorations for weddings.
faq.a2: Yes, we serve major cities across Nigeria. Please contact us for specific location inquiries.
faq.a3: You can book by contacting us via phone, email, or the contact form on our website.
faq.q4_prefix: What is the minimum booking time for
faq.a4_generic: Minimum booking times may vary depending on the event and location. Please contact us for details.
